mapper.select: select x.product_code, x.product_name, y.new_p_img_path, x.price from product x inner join product_img y on x.product_code = y.product_code where p_img_code in (select min(p_img_code) from product_img group by product_code)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_code, price, product_name, release_date,country,real_size,p_category_code,p_board_content,write_date) VALUES(PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{price},#{product_name},#{release_date},#{country},#{real_size},#{p_category_code},#{p_board_content},sysdate) SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO product_img(p_img_code, p_img_path, new_p_img_path, product_code) VALUES(product_img_seq.nextval,#{p_img_path},#{new_p_img_path},#{product_code})
